[[Image:The Mall logo.png|thumb|right|The Mall logo.]]
+
'''The Mall Barnsley ''' is [[Barnsley]]'s main shopping complex, housing 41 shops and adjacent to Barnsley Market. The centre was opened in 1991 and was originally known as the Alhambra Centre. A number of chains have been in the centre in the past, most notable was [[Woolworths Group|Woolworths]] which ceased trading in December 2008. It is owned and operated by [[The Mall Company]], a large company that operates shopping centres throughout the UK. In the centre there are a number of small retail stalls which encourage independent businesses to start.
'''The Mall Barnsley ''' is [[Barnsley]]'s main shopping complex, housing 41 shops and adjacent to Barnsley Market. The centre was opened in 1991 and was originally known as the Alhambra Centre. A number of chains have been in the centre in the past, most notable was [[Woolworths Group|Woolworths]] which ceased trading in December 2008. It is owned and operated by [[The Mall Company]], a large company that operates shopping centres throughout the UK. In the centre there are a number of small retail stalls which encourage independent businesses to start.
